#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define rep(i,n) for(int i=0;i<n;i++)

map< string, int > mp;
string first,last;
vector< string > ans;
vector< pair < int, string > > PP;
set<string> SSS;
int main ()
{
    int t; cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ans.clear();mp.clear(); first.clear(); last.clear(); PP.clear(); SSS.clear();
        string SS;
        int n; cin>>n;
        for(int i = 1; i<=n; i++) {
            string ss; cin>>ss;
            mp[ss]++;
        }
        rep(i, mp["aa"]/2) {
            ans.push_back("aa");
        }
        rep(i, min(mp["ab"], mp["ba"])) ans.push_back("ab");
        rep(i, mp["bb"]/2) ans.push_back("bb");
        if(mp["aa"]%2!=0) ans.push_back("aa");
        else if(mp["bb"]%2!=0) ans.push_back("bb");
        rep(i, mp["bb"]/2) ans.push_back("bb");
        rep(i, min(mp["ab"], mp["ba"])) ans.push_back("ba");
        rep(i, mp["aa"]/2) ans.push_back("aa");
        string S;
        for(int i = 0; i<ans.size(); i++) S += ans[i];
        cout<<S<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
